what: Beta-mixture Unsupervised Oligodendrocytes Segmentation System in R
title: Beta-mixture Unsupervised Oligodendrocytes Segmentation System in R
text: bossr consists functions automated segmentation oligodendrocytes 2D, 3D 4D arrays. companion data package ‘bossrdata’ available enable users follow along examples vignettes. See vignettes information install ‘bossrdata’.

title: Beta-mixture Unsupervised Oligodendrocytes Segmentation System in R
text: install development can also choose install example dataset get started [TODO: add link] using bossr.
code: # Install released version from our drat repository install.packages("bossr", repos='https://pennsive.github.io/drat') devtools::install_github('pennsive/bossr') # Install the companion package install.packages("bossrdata", repos='https://pennsive.github.io/drat')

title: Annotate data.frame — annotate_df
text: function takes dataframe result post.process.df (track.components) integer t (total timepoints), returns dataframe 4 columns: count, addition, deletion, survivor. count column contains number rows input dataframe "t" column value equal j, j 1 t. addition column contains number new rows dataframe time j j + 1. deletion column contains number rows dataframe time j appear dataframe later time. survivor column contains number rows dataframe time j also appear dataframe time j + 1.

title: Annotate data.frame — annotate_df
Annotate data.frame — annotate_df
text: df dataframe t integer value

title: Annotate data.frame — annotate_df
text: dataframe 4 columns: count, addition, deletion, survivor.

what: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix_2d
title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix_2d
text: function takes 2D array number mixture components inputs, returns threshold value. first extracts values certain intensity array, scales values 0.0001 0.9999, fits beta mixture model scaled values, calculates density difference two beta distributions. Finally, scales intersection point distributions back original scale array values returns threshold.

title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix_2d
Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix_2d
text: arr 2D array values mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2.

title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix_2d
text: threshold value

what: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix_3d
title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix_3d
text: function takes 3D array, number mixture components, number cores additional parameters inputs, returns threshold value. applies betamix_2d function slice 3D array  returns threshold value slice.

title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix_3d
Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix_3d
text: arr 3D array values mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2. n.cores number cores used parallel computing. Default 1. ... additional parameters passed mclapply

title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix_3d
text: threshold value

what: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix_4d
title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix_4d
text: function takes 4D array, number mixture components, number cores additional parameters inputs, returns threshold value. applies betamix_3d function time point 4D array  returns threshold value time point.

title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix_4d
Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix_4d
text: arr 4D array values mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2. n.cores number cores used parallel computing. Default 1. ... additional parameters passed mclapply

title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix_4d
text: threshold value

what: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix_img
title: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix_img
text: function takes image array, number mixture components, number cores additional parameters inputs, returns threshold value. detects dimension image array applies betamix_2d(), betamix_3d(), betamix_4d() accordingly calculate threshold.

title: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix_img
Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix_img
text: arr image array mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2. n.cores number cores used parallel computing. Default 1. ... additional parameters passed betamix_3d() betamix_4d() functions

title: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix_img
text: threshold value

what: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
text: list2nifti() converts list arrays Nifti object using oro.nifti package.

title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
text: list list arrays converted Nifti object. dims vector dimensions resulting array.

title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
text: Nifti object created input list arrays.

title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
code: list2nifti(list(array(1:12, c(3, 4)), array(13:24, c(3, 4))), c(3, 4, 2)) #> NIfTI-1 format #>   Type            : nifti #>   Data Type       : 2 (UINT8) #>   Bits per Pixel  : 8 #>   Slice Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Intent Code     : 0 (None) #>   Qform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Sform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Dimension       : 3 x 4 x 2 #>   Pixel Dimension : 1 x 1 x 1 #>   Voxel Units     : Unknown #>   Time Units      : Unknown  # convert a list of 3D arrays to a 4D Nifti object list2nifti(list(array(1:12, c(3, 4, 3)), array(13:24, c(3, 4, 3))), c(3, 4, 3, 2)) #> NIfTI-1 format #>   Type            : nifti #>   Data Type       : 2 (UINT8) #>   Bits per Pixel  : 8 #>   Slice Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Intent Code     : 0 (None) #>   Qform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Sform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Dimension       : 3 x 4 x 3 x 2 #>   Pixel Dimension : 1 x 1 x 1 x 1 #>   Voxel Units     : Unknown #>   Time Units      : Unknown
